select_channel.description: Selects the specified channel for subsequent measurements and settings, allowing the user to operate on a particular channel.

_get_setting_current.description: Retrieves the current setting for the selected channel, indicating the current limit set in the device.

_get_setting_voltage.description: Retrieves the voltage setting for the selected channel, indicating the voltage level set in the device.

_get_current_current.description: Measures and returns the actual current flowing through the specified channel, providing real-time current monitoring.

_get_current_voltage.description: Measures and returns the actual voltage at the output of the specified channel, allowing for real-time voltage monitoring.

_output_switching_off.description: Turns off the output for the specified channel, preventing any current or voltage output from that channel.

_output_switching_on.description: Turns on the output for the specified channel, allowing current or voltage to be supplied to external circuits.

_set_current.description: Sets the current value for the specified channel, allowing the user to define a maximum current limit.

_set_voltage.description: Sets the voltage value for the specified channel, allowing the user to establish an output voltage level.
